name: npm3
description: Wraps npm v3 so you can run it alongside npm v2

scripts.selfupdate: npm install --save npm@3.0-next --cache-min=0 && npm run commit
scripts.commit: export NPM_VERSION=$(npm info npm@3.0-next version --cache-min=Infinity); git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade to npm@$NPM_VERSION"

author: Tim Oxley <secoif@gmail.com>
